game_description: Butterfly, backstroke, or freestyle! Swim around just like a real turtle, no buttons or joysticks required! Play on your own or join your fellow turtles in a public or private game. Enjoy anything from showing off your tricks on the diving board to exploring hidden treasures! There are currently three unique game modes: Turtle Ball: An underwater game of two-team dodgeball. Hit turtles on the other team to switch them to your own team. Last team standing wins! Zones: A game where turtles race to randomly safe zones that spawn randomly around the ocean. Anyone too slow will be frozen and can slow down unfrozen turtles. Casual: Hang out with other turtles with no rules!
